skills.title: Html5
skills.text: I have strong HTML skills, and am able to create pages and components to fit designs well. I am also familiar with accesibility standards and WCAG guidelines.

skills.title: CSS
skills.text: I have good CSS abilities. I am able to use CSS to style components effectively, and can follow given designs well.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.text: My JavaScrips skills are good, and are developing rapidly. I have been using vanilla JavaScript for a reasonably short time, but I can write and understand it well, and am able to use it effectively.

skills.title: React
skills.text: I am currently attempting to learn about the React.js framework. I have seen how powerful a tool React can be, and I am keep to become a competent React developer in the near future.

skills.title: Java
skills.text: I have worked with Java prior to University, and within my University studies and coursework. I have grown comfortable with both Object-Oriented and Functional programming with Java, and have built several practice applications.

skills.title: Version Control
skills.text: I am comfortable with version control and have experience with Azure DevOps and GitHub. I am familiar with branching strategies, and have worked on projects using Gitflow.

skills.title: ASP.NET
skills.text: I have experience with both .NET Core and .NET MVC. During my placement year I worked on a client account for approximately 14 months, using MVC .NET. During my final year I have also worked on a project using the .NET Core architecture and have gotten comfortable with it's full stack.
